content: have you been dreaming of adding a granny square cardigan to your wardrobe you re in luck - it doesn t get any easier or more gorgeous than the rose cardigan the size you make is adjustable ** start your rose cardigan 1 ** i ve always dreamed of having a vintage-inspired granny square cardigan in my closet and now i do and you can too i ll walk you through the steps of creating the rose granny square cardigan of your dreams with helpful tips and video tutorials to help you along the way this pattern is more like a recipe breaking down the appropriate materials and techniques needed - you bring the creativity this project works great for dk weight advents project leftovers or full skeins that you re dyeing to use up **materials ** -5mm crochet hook -670 grams of dk weight yarn for granny squares -425 grams of dk weight yarn for joining + ribbing -six 1 5″ 38mm coconut buttons- -tapestry needle -scissors -locking stitch markers -steam blocking supplies including foam mats a garment steamer and t-pins or knit blockers this is a completely free pattern based a crochet granny square cardigan that i originally made with a dk weight holiday advent please consider sharing your project here on ravelry to encourage more crocheters to fall in love with making garments and other wearables xo 1 https //tlycblog com/how-to-crochet-a-colorful-granny-square-cardigan-rose-cardigan/
